largeProjects.title: ScreenDime
largeProjects.skills: Mobile App Development - UX/UI Design - User Testing
largeProjects.description: This app helps users reduce phone usage and combat loneliness by encouraging real-world connections. Through challenges and bets, users compete to achieve the lowest screen time over a set period, with leaderboards and group comparisons fostering friendly competition. The app promotes healthier digital habits and inspires users to spend more time engaging with their surroundings, reducing isolation and enhancing social interaction.

largeProjects.title: Sustainable Innovation Network
largeProjects.description: Sustainable Innovation Network (SIN) is a student-led social entrepreneurship organization with a mission to bridge impact and business. This project involved designing and developing SIN's website!

largeProjects.title: Paul's
largeProjects.tagline: From Grandpa’s doodle to your morning brew – Paul’s Café.
largeProjects.description: This website is a nostalgic digital experience inspired by Grandpa Paul’s daily visits to his local café. The site combines hand-drawn illustrations and simple design to capture the warmth and simplicity of morning rituals. It's a tribute to the little moments that make mornings special.

largeProjects.title: Strava Train Together
largeProjects.skills: Product Design - UX/UI Design - User Research
largeProjects.tagline: The journey matters as much as the finish line!
largeProjects.description: This project proposes a new feature for Strava that enables users to plan, schedule, and track workouts together with friends and family. Focusing on collaboration rather than competition, the feature allows users to link workouts to their calendars, add photos, and track progress throughout their training cycles. By fostering a sense of community and accountability, this feature helps users stay motivated and achieve their fitness goals in a supportive, fun way.

smallProjects.title: Adopt All Animals
smallProjects.description: A user-friendly animal database application meant to connect customers and suppliers in an all-in-one platform allowing users to browse, add, and modify various detailed animal profiles.

smallProjects.title: Sydney Housing
smallProjects.skills: Machine Learning - Front End Development - Data Manipulation
smallProjects.description: A machine learning-powered tool that predicts housing prices helping Sydney renters find agents offering rental prices below or above the market average, using a datset of approximately 30,000 property records.

smallProjects.title: Spreadsheet Web App
smallProjects.description: An application that mimics the look and functionality of spreadsheet apps like Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel.
